name: Krzysztof Nowak
story: Olaf Zimniak grew up in a small town in Poland. He served in the Polish Army for several years before becoming disillusioned with the military life. In his mid-thirties he left the army and became a freelance looter, scavenging and stealing whatever he could find to support himself. He has been hired by the INDEPENDENT faction to help them scavenge for supplies and weapons in the aftermath of the war.
